modmenu.description.scandium: A high-performance rendering optimization mod for Fabric, featuring advanced culling techniques like FOV culling and aggressive mountain culling. Seamlessly integrated with Sodium.
scandium.options.title: Scandium
scandium.option.enabled.tooltip: Enables or disables the Scandium culling engine.
scandium.option.sync_with_sodium.tooltip: Synchronizes the culling cache with Sodium's rendering frame.
scandium.option.ignore_spectator_mode.to: Enabled by default. When enabled, culling logic still applies in spectator mode. When disabled, culling is disabled for spectators to prevent visual glitches when passing through blocks.
scandium.option.fov_culling.tooltip: Culls chunks that are outside the player's field of view.
scandium.option.fov_angle.tooltip: The angle for FOV culling. Higher values are safer.
scandium.option.reserved_height.tooltip: The height offset for vertical culling in chunks.
scandium.option.update_speed.tooltip: How frequently the culling cache is updated.
scandium.option.mountain_culling.tooltip: More aggressively culls chunks behind mountains or under ceilings.
scandium.option.transparency_awareness.t: Prevents culling of transparent or semi-transparent chunks.
scandium.option.aggressive_vertical_cull: Disabled by default. When enabled, applies more aggressive vertical culling strategies to improve performance in caves, at the risk of minor flickering in complex terrain.
scandium.option.underground_horizontal_c: When deep underground, restricts the horizontal render distance to significantly boost performance, as visibility is usually limited by terrain.
scandium.option.underground_horizontal_d: The radius for underground horizontal culling (in chunks). Smaller values give more performance but might show air in very large caves.
scandium.option.debug_mode.tooltip: Displays culling statistics in the action bar.
